name: Dimusica/Livebeats
tag_list: live, stream, streaming, music, video, videos, broadcast, broadcasting, mobile, app
overview:
Livebeats.com is a video streaming provider and social platform for Live Music Online Entertainment. Livebeats is a business to business (labels, artists, promoters) to consumer (fans, followers, user) service.

Bands, labels, promoters and festivals can user generate the easy way their own “virtual stage” and stream and share live concerts, showcases or dj sets with the highest image and sound quality, using livebeats’ own browser-based plug&play streaming interface with multiple camera detection.

The Livebeats player is a unique tool for live music streaming. It has been developed with the intention to provide musicians - 80% of which have never performed in front of an audience - their own virtual stage. Livebeats enables musicians, to schedule their show, promote it, invite friends and share the live performance with the world.

Although built primarily for the long tail of the music scene, the technology and service are fully scalable so as to match the traffic demand for high profile events for which Livebeats offers also a PPV solution for Facebook pages. The ticket to watch the show can conveniently be purchased in the player itself.

In collaboration with ABC Entertainment, Livebeats Concerts also produces top acts, taking care of contracting, production and distribution. Livebeats Concerts owns the rights to realise the events e.g. by streaming live to the Internet, license to cinemas, TV Stations and Cable Networks.
